description: Nebraska Constitution provisions relevant to child welfare and family rights.
copyright: Project Milk Carton 501(c)(3) - All Rights Reserved

relevant_provisions.name: Search and Seizure
relevant_provisions.text: The right of the people to be secure in their persons, houses, papers, and effects against unreasonable searches and seizures shall not be violated...
relevant_provisions.application_to_cps: CPS removal of a child constitutes a seizure. Warrantless removals must meet exigent circumstances exception or be supported by court order.

relevant_provisions.name: Due Process / Law of the Land
relevant_provisions.text: No person shall be deprived of life, liberty, or property, without due process of law...
relevant_provisions.application_to_cps: Parents have a fundamental liberty interest in the care and custody of their children. Termination of parental rights requires clear and convincing evidence and proper procedural protections.
